description.narrative: 4.3 Parents/caregivers and adolescents are better informed to prevent and respond to violence and harmful practices., which contributes to Access To Justice, Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage), Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2023, fewer children experience physical and sexual violence, abuse and exploitation
